Meet the Team

Our people are passionate about breaking down the barriers faced by social entrepreneurs and delivering market leading support to grow their impact

Social Entrepreneur Support

Our Social Entrepreneur Support team are the people delivering market leading support to social entrepreneurs through one-to-one coaching and enabling peer to peer connections to other award winners and alumni. We're here to help you from the start your journey with us so you may also receive support from us to help you access our awards (grant funding) if you have additional needs when you apply.

Delivery and Investment

Designing and delivering market-leading support with and alongside our partners, supporters and colleagues. We are focussed on breaking down the barriers faced by social entrepreneurs. This includes accessing specialist expertise through our partnership work, and accessing the right investment through the Growth Impact Fund.

Corporate Services

Look after our people, systems and finances to ensure a well governed organisation to always deliver value for money support to social entrepreneurs by maximising the impact of available financial resources and fostering a culture of inclusion and belonging for our colleagues.
